p: As previously mentioned, the bioactive composition of the sage product will depend on the extraction technique used, but also on the part of the plant used. Table 1 shows the bioactive composition of sage extracts obtained with hydrodistillation, depending on the part of the plant used, while Table 2 shows the bioactive profile of extracts obtained with supercritical fluid extraction. Bioactive profile for all other types of sage extracts are shown in Table 3. Extracts from sage leaves had the highest content of polyphenols, followed by aerial parts.
